org.semanticweb.yars.nx.util

Class NxUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.semanticweb.yars.nx.util.NxUtil

  • public class NxUtil
extends Object
    Some utility methods that used to be spread over a couple of other classes.
    Author:
    Tobias Kaefer, others that wrote the methods in the first place

    • Method Detail

      • escapeForNx

        public static String escapeForNx(String lit)
        Escapes strings to unicode. Note that this method does not all the work required by the spec for processing URIs. URI.toASCIIString() could be your friend here.
        See Also:
        What the spec says about the encoding of strings, What the spec says on the encoding of URIs

      • escapeForMarkup

        public static String escapeForMarkup(String lit)
        Escapes strings for markup.

      • unescape

        Unescape special characters in literal by removing excess backslashes.
        Parameters:
        str - The string to escape

      • unescape

        public static String unescape(String str,
              boolean clean)
        Unescape special characters in literal by removing excess backslashes.
        Parameters:
        str - The string to escape
        clean - If true, cleans up excess slashes
